metadata.Description: The sustainable use of ocean resources for economic growth, improved livelihoods, and jobs while preserving the health of the ocean ecosystem.

entities.Description: Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
Energy generated from the wind through the use of wind turbines to produce electricity.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
Assessments of the environmental impact of projects
Renewable energy generated from sources located in bodies of water, such as wind farms or tidal power plants.
Organizations that focus on energy issues within a specific region.

relations.Description: The blue economy implements sustainable fisheries practices to ensure the long-term health and productivity of marine ecosystems.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy funds various ocean conservation projects to protect marine biodiversity and ecosystems.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy focuses on the development and utilization of marine renewable energy sources to reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy operates in coastal communities, supporting sustainable economic activities that benefit both the environment and local populations.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy partners with marine research institutions to promote scientific knowledge and innovation in sustainable ocean management.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy contributes to climate change mitigation efforts by promoting sustainable practices that reduce greenhouse gas emissions from marine activities.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy monitors ocean pollution levels to identify sources and implement measures to reduce contamination and protect marine ecosystems.
relations.Subject: blue economy

relations.Description: The blue economy targets the development of sustainable aquaculture practices to ensure the responsible production of seafood without harming the environment.
relations.Subject: blue economy
offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy implements building standards that promote the use of sustainable energy sources and technologies.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy funds research and development projects to advance the use of sustainable energy technologies.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy focuses on harnessing wave energy as a sustainable energy source.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy operates in the marine environment to harness sustainable energy from wind, waves, and tides.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy partners with environmental organizations to ensure sustainable practices and minimize environmental impact.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy contributes to climate change mitigation by reducing greenhouse gas emissions and dependence on fossil fuels.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy monitors its environmental impact to ensure sustainable operations and minimize harm to marine ecosystems.

relations.Subject: offshore renewable energy
relations.Description: Offshore renewable energy targets increased renewable energy generation to meet sustainable energy goals and reduce reliance on non-renewable sources.

relations.Subject: wind energy
relations.Description: Wind energy implements Energy Efficiency Policy by promoting the use of energy-saving designs and materials.

relations.Subject: regional energy organizations
relations.Description: Regional energy organizations implement energy efficiency policies to promote sustainable energy practices.

relations.Subject: environmental impact assessments
relations.Description: Environmental impact assessments employ the expertise of environmental experts to evaluate the potential environmental effects of energy projects.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.
